name: Idol of N'Zoth
description:
Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 606 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.
